00005 #ifndef __ENET_TIME_H__
00006 #define __ENET_TIME_H__
00007 
00008 #define ENET_TIME_OVERFLOW 86400000
00009 
00010 #define ENET_TIME_LESS(a, b) ((a) - (b) >= ENET_TIME_OVERFLOW)
00011 #define ENET_TIME_GREATER(a, b) ((b) - (a) >= ENET_TIME_OVERFLOW)
00012 #define ENET_TIME_LESS_EQUAL(a, b) (! ENET_TIME_GREATER (a, b))
00013 #define ENET_TIME_GREATER_EQUAL(a, b) (! ENET_TIME_LESS (a, b))
00014 
00015 #define ENET_TIME_DIFFERENCE(a, b) ((a) - (b) >= ENET_TIME_OVERFLOW ? (b) - (a) : (a) - (b))
00016 
00017 #endif /* __ENET_TIME_H__ */
